phases.name: Phase 1 – Hardware Foundations & Modern Embedded C++
phases.description: Calibrate hardware lab, sharpen modern C++ for microcontrollers, and build disciplined debugging habits. End goal: confidently shipping bring-up firmware on STM32 and ESP32 targets.

weeks.focus: Week 1 – Lab setup, toolchain mastery, baseline measurements

tasks.title: Provision hardware lab & version-controlled configs
tasks.description: Assemble STM32 Nucleo, ESP32 DevKit, logic analyzer, multimeter. Capture wiring diagrams and udev rules in Git-managed lab repo.
tasks.ai_prompt: Review my lab inventory and suggest safeguards for ESD, labeling, and repeatable flashing procedures.

tasks.title: Stand up reproducible build environments
tasks.description: Install arm-none-eabi toolchain, PlatformIO, Zephyr SDK, clang-format hooks. Automate setup via devcontainer and shell script.
tasks.ai_prompt: Inspect my devcontainer.json and post-create commands; highlight missing dependencies or caching tricks.

tasks.title: Instrument baseline power & timing measurements
tasks.description: Bring up reference blink firmware, capture current draw vs. supply voltage, and record GPIO toggle latency using logic analyzer.
tasks.ai_prompt: Given oscilloscope captures, estimate ISR jitter and recommend probe settings for cleaner edges.

days.notes: Focus: Provision hardware lab & version-controlled configs

weeks.focus: Week 2 – Modern C++ firmware patterns & memory safety

tasks.title: Benchmark RAII peripheral wrappers
tasks.description: Refactor bare-metal drivers to RAII abstractions using templates and constexpr config. Compare flash/RAM usage to C baseline.
tasks.ai_prompt: Suggest improvements to my template-based GPIO wrapper ensuring zero-cost abstractions.

tasks.title: Static analysis & sanitizers configuration
tasks.description: Enable clang-tidy, cppcheck, and UBSan/ASan where supported via QEMU. Gate CI on static analysis profile.
tasks.ai_prompt: Review clang-tidy config for embedded constraints; recommend rule adjustments to reduce noise.

tasks.title: Memory layout deep dive
tasks.description: Analyze linker script, map file, and startup code. Document boot flow, stack/heap usage, and zero-init sections.
tasks.ai_prompt: Given my linker map, highlight sections to relocate to CCM or DTCM for latency gains.

projects.name: LabOps Automation Suite
projects.description: GitOps-managed lab setup for the MSI B850M + Ryzen 7 7700 rig, covering BIOS profiles, dual-boot imaging, CUDA/RTX enablement, and repeatable VS Code devcontainer provisioning.

projects.name: Deterministic Timing Harness
projects.description: Cycle-accurate STM32/ESP32 harness that records power, jitter, and ISR latency via Saleae + AMD PMU traces; feeds Grafana dashboards for regression tracking.

projects.name: Debug Resilience Playbook
projects.description: OpenOCD/pyOCD automation scripts plus Notion SOPs for fault triage, covering brownouts, flash corruption, and SWD recovery on the lab boards.

projects.name: Multi-sensor Baseline Kit
projects.description: Bring-up of IMU/pressure/temp stack on STM32 + ESP32 with shared SPI/I2C arbitration, automated tests, and Grafana-exported energy metrics.

phases.name: Phase 2 – Real-Time Systems & Connected Firmware
phases.description: Deepen RTOS mastery, design resilient connectivity stacks, and harden security for fleet-ready firmware. Culminates in a production-quality Zephyr/FreeRTOS application spanning CAN, Ethernet, BLE, and secure provisioning.

phases.name: Phase 3 – Edge Intelligence, Safety & Manufacturing Readiness
phases.description: Blend TinyML with safety-critical practices, harden products for compliance, and build manufacturing-grade test infrastructure. End state: intelligent, secure firmware paired with production test rigs and certification artefacts.

tasks.title: Dataset curation & labeling
tasks.description: Collect sensor datasets (IMU, audio), perform labeling in Edge Impulse, and version datasets.
tasks.ai_prompt: Review dataset stats; recommend augmentation strategies and balancing.

tasks.title: Model prototyping
tasks.description: Train baseline models using TensorFlow/Keras, evaluate accuracy/F1, document pipeline.
tasks.ai_prompt: Analyze training logs; propose architecture tweaks for latency constraints.

tasks.title: TFLite Micro deployment
tasks.description: Integrate TFLM interpreter on STM32, measure inference latency and memory footprint.
tasks.ai_prompt: Review TFLM arena configuration; suggest memory savings without accuracy loss.
